message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident it will serve you well.  I'm asking for $15,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I can't go as low as $10,000, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and what it can do for you.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, but I really need to stay within my budget.
